title: Chocolate cupcakes with Halloween toppers
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '60g butter, softened', '100g icing sugar', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons milk', '300g chocolate sauce', '160g plain flour', '2 tablespoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', 'For the icing', '225g cream cheese, softened', '60g butter, softened', '125g icing sugar, sifted', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'orange and black food colouring, or cocoa powder', 'For the decorations', 'yellow and orange sugar strands', 'cocktail sticks', 'Halloween motives cut out of paper']
